file_content.text: Sergeant Peden's Personal Log, Entry 53: My team and I are already back out in the cold to hunt some new Republic spy droids.
The droids' capabilities vary so wildly; the details read more like ghost stories than combat reports. Snow-fever dreams, if you ask me.
Real or not, Lieutenant Durand is anxious to see them stopped. Judging by his mood, they must have compromised a few operations.
Intelligence pinpointed the droids' deployment zone. We're en route to sweep the area and destroy any droids we find.
Hopefully we can get some time indoors when this is done.
